ygData.subject: Re: patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour  question
ygData.msgSnippet: Err Fennin Ro server?  Come to Innoruuk lah.  Our parang chopper got lvl 35 enchanter elsewhere also LPPL start a new one in Innoruuk.  U wanna kena chopped
ygData.messageBody:
Err Fennin Ro server? Come to Innoruuk lah. Our parang chopper got lvl 35
enchanter elsewhere also LPPL start a new one in Innoruuk. U wanna kena
chopped issit? ;)

Now most impt is to get my wiz to lvl 16 and get the invis spell first.
W/o it my butt kena kicked until sored. Last night I'm hunting derv
alone, sharing kills with another 2 group of lvl 10-12 players. Seem like
good xp there, but down time kinda long coz I used up at least 80% of my
mana for every kill ;( Other groups kill 2 b4 I can kill 1, sigh.

Ziltus

On Wednesday, June 23, 1999 10:10 AM, Yap Sieh Roy
[SMTP:sryap@...] wrote:
> From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
>
> oops .. here it is ...
>
> koradaf/fennin ro server/lvl 8/warrior/currently hanging around freeport
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 1:24 AM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced leather
armour
> question
>
>
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >
> > You still have not surrender your character name/location/level/class
to
> > me...... Wanna be chop izzit?
> >
> > Yap Sieh Roy wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
> > >
> > > hi,
> > >
> > > been trying to practise my tailoring skillz.. i got a couple of
> questions
> > > abt making armour, hope u guys can help.
> > >
> > > ruined pelt + pattern = patchwork armour
> > > medium pelt + studs + pattern = studded armour
> > > hi-quality pelt + file + pattern = reinforced armour
> > >
> > > the above is as far as i understand from the tailoring book. there is
> only 2
> > > slots in the sewing kit so.patchwork is no problem but what about
> studded
> > > and reinforced where 3 items are required? what is the sequence of
> making
> > > them ?
> > >
> > > thanks !
> > > roy
